promos.title: Stuart Pigott Book Signing
promos.description: Stuart Pigott joins us for a book signing and wine-tasting.

promos.title: Pillitteri Guerrilla Luncheon
promos.description: Join us for a guerrilla luncheon series highlighting Niagara region’s chef’s, produce and wine in a spectacular setting. This casual and unique lunch offers 3 to 5 menu items that is lunch themed and reflective of the individual chefs’ creativity and style. Menu items will be price conscious (suggested price range of $7-$15 per item). Wine is offered by the glass or bottle with a selection paired to the chefs daily menu ($5 per glass, bottle at retail prices). Reservations NOT required. If you want to know more you'll have to pop in to find out.
